column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I've been to this Lou's location for both take out and sit-down and the wait was a lot better than the long lines at the Lincoln Ave location.  First of all
column2: anything with the name buttercrust is an obvious way to lure me in.  It is indeed buttery.  While eating in
column3: I've done several of the fried appetizers which are all greasy goodness personified.  Mmm.  I could go for some Lou's right now.  Do you deliver to my work?
